reviews.text: Clear orange body with a thick white head. Aroma is light malt, faint caramel and peach. Taste is sweet with medium bitterness. Texture is creamy, carbonation is soft.
Brown colour. Caramel aroma. Taste is sweet malty caramel with some alcohol.
Spicy aromas...some wild yeast presence on taste. white grapes and sparkling aftertaste. Very nice saison beer.
